009package imagingbook.common.util;
010
011public abstract class ArrayUtils {
012        
013        private ArrayUtils() {}
014        
015        /**
016         * Counts the number of non-null elements in the given (non-primitive) array.
017         * @param arr an array of non-primitive type
018         * @return the number of non-null elements
019         */
020        public static int countNonNullElements(Object[] arr) {
021                int cnt = 0;
022                for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
023                        if (arr[i] != null) {
024                                cnt++;
025                        }
026                }
027                return cnt;
028        }
029
030}
